ENG
In a lawless land, luck favors only the strong and courageous. Ara, a man of action and few words, is the leader of a band of armed motorcyclists who believes in an ancient legend capable of restoring justice and freedom to the people of the region. When performing a daring robbery, just arousing the fury of powerful Tenorio. Now, Tenorio will concentrate all his forces in a pursuit to destroy the Ara gang and recover what he believes is rightfully his. During the chase, Laura Young is rescued from an accident and have to follow the pack against his will, arousing jealousy in Severina, Ara companion
